attributes.review: This is the worst app that I have ever downloaded. Everytime I opened the app I had to wait exactly 4 hours and 33 minutes for it to work. Also the graphics of the app are visually disgusting it made my eyes vomit every single time I had to look at it. Also Trump 2020? Couldnâ€™t you be more creative jeez. Besides all of that I was promised that the app would have mini games, which by the way it ABSOLUTELY DID NOT!!! THAT WAS EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING. By the way if you were to download this awful app then remember to leave an awful review and rate it the worst because it deserves it for wasting MY TIME.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD
